name: Trapmaster
description:
Trapmaster is a small project made over 3 days. It was originally meant for Mini Jam 37, but it didn't fit the limitation so I decided not to submit it for that jam. However it was still worth finishing so I did.

The gimmick is that while you have to set up a turret defense to survive through each wave, you also have to wire up your contraptions so they can activate! Whether this means connecting a Pressure Plate to a Turret or connecting a Generator to a set of Walls to make them regenerate health.
